traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The flying monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +l to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 -1) piercing damage.
